entry.title: $1875 // *** LARGE KING BEDROOM *** NEAR SUBWAY *** PRIVATE OUTDOOR SPACE***
entry.content:
*** LARGE KING BEDROOM *** NEAR SUBWAY *** PRIVATE OUTDOOR SPACE***

Listing ID #: 168869
Price: $1,875
Property Type: Apartment
Bedrooms: 1.0
Bathrooms: 1.0
Pets: Case By Case

Apartment Amenities

Eat In Kitchen
Hardwood
Light
Outdoor Space

This large 1 bedroom apartment is located in a nice multi family building in Astoria, Queens.The apartment features: Hardwood floors in bedroom, LARGE Eat-in kitchen, Large living room, king size bedroom, Multiple Sunlit windows and 2 large closets. * Heat & hot water included in the rent. * small pets allowed! * This will not last!

Located on a nice block easy for parking and only a 2 minute walk to the Broadway or 36th ave N & Q stop. 10 minute train ride to manhattan. Laundromat down the block. By all major highways!!

Contact Andreas Kambanis your Astoria, Long Island City specialist today for a viewing. CELL: 917-731-1729 Email: Andreas@BouklisGroup.com [email protected]
